snippet.title: Super Don Quix-ote HD Arcade
snippet.description:
You are a knight named Don. Your girlfriend, Isabella, has been captured by an evil witch who is holding her hostage. 
You have a sword for a weapon and a sidekick named Sancho. You must battle your way to the witch's hideout and save Isabella.

Gameplay-wise, Super Don Quix-ote was very similar to Dragon's Lair and Space Ace; there are joystick directional inputs and the hero's sword, in most cases, failing a scene would advance you to the next scene (but you can set it to repeat it), with the failed scene showing up again later in the game. 

This HD version is made by Poiu http://www.emuline.org/profile/38972-poiu/
It has a shit ton of settings,so it's easy for you to find your comfortable playstyle and it's HD.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InsertCoinArcadeOfficial/
Email: insertcoinarcade@outlook.it
